explains: n. 小妖精；顽皮的丑小鬼

sentences.en: It is believed that the 459 described species of goblin spiders are only about 20 percent of the total species.
sentences.cn: 人们认为，所描述的459种地精蜘蛛仅占总种类的20%。

sentences.en: Harry might have saved Griphook's wrinkly skin at the end of Deathly Hallows Part 1, but that doesn't mean the goblin is ready to join the fight .
sentences.cn: 在《死亡圣器（上）》中，哈利也许救下了地精拉环皱皱的皮肤，但这并不意味着这个地精会立刻加入到对抗中。

sentences.en: Hey, fellow goblin, do you hear that sound?
sentences.cn: 嗨，地精伙伴，你听见那声音没？
